english.segment1: As I seek you. Let me find you. As I search for you. With all my heart
english.segment2: As I praise you. Let me know you. Let me love your ways. And trust your heart
english.segment3: Don't let my heart be hardened. Don't let my words be insincere. Fill me to overflowing
english.segment4: As I worship. As I glorify your name. Won't you make me. A sacrifice of praise. As I bow down. As I magnify your name. Won't you make me. A sacrifice of praise. A sacrifice of praise
english.segment5: Don't let my heart deceive me. Don't let me turn from your desires. Show me the way to freedom
english.segment6: Make me an instrument. Of pure design. Fully obedient. Fully refined.
